item.description:
Designers Group is a collaboration between Fashion 2010 and the Boston Fashion Meetup Group
We will be gathering a list of ideas and follow ups to attempt to secure a space in the Boston area for the purpose of allowing fashion designers to sell their clothes and accesories. There will also be time for networking.

Also, if any clothing designers have some questions on design, patterns, production, or business, Shirley Willett, an expert with 63 years in the fashion industry, will be avalable to answer some of them

Evan Shapiro, Organizer, Fashion 2010
Shirley Willett, Assistant Organizer, Fashion 2910 & Boston Fashion Meetup
item.name: DESIGNERS GROUP
